moves.name: Brine
moves.effect: Its power is doubled if the target’s HP is at half or below.

moves.name: Grand Illusion!
moves.effect: Activates the Status Condition Reflection effect on the allied field of play. Makes the user able to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.

moves.name: Mirror Coat
moves.effect: The user takes up a counterattacking posture. Using this move again will cause the user to leave this posture. No other actions can be taken while in this posture. The user will attack if hit by a special move while it is in this counterattacking posture, then the user leaves this posture. The more damage the user has taken from the opponent’s move, the greater the power of this move.

syncMove.name: Aquatic Prince Hydro Pump
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the target is trapped.

passives.name: Stationary Target 5
passives.description: Powers up moves when the target is trapped.

passives.name: Pokey Trap 5
passives.description: Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being trapped.

passives.name: Recuperation 2
passives.description: Restores the user’s HP after using a sync move.

grid.bonus: Mirror Coat:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Mirror Coat:Catalytic Cure 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring the user’s HP when a move is successful.
Whirlpool:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Brine:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Brine:Dire Rain 1- Critical hits land more easily when an attack move is used while the weather is rainy.
Grand Illusion!:Inspire Ire- Makes opponents target the user for a short time when a move is successful.
Grand Illusion!:Shielded Squad 2- Sharply raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs when a move is successful.
Superduper Effective 2- Powers up moves that are super effective.
First Aid 4- Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
Unyielding 2- When the user has endured the most recent hit and has 1 HP remaining, has a moderate chance of allowing the user to endure an additional hit that would reduce it to 0 HP.
Indomitable 1- Has a small chance of raising the user’s Sp. Atk if any of the user’s stats have been lowered.
Grand Entry 1- Raises the user’s Sp. Atk when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Revenge Boost 4- Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
Stationary Target 3- Powers up moves when the target is trapped.
Healthy Healing- Makes the user gradually heal itself if its HP is full when it enters a battle.
Pokey Trap 1- Increases the amount of damage the target takes from being trapped.
Sterner Stuff 2- Reduces damage when the user is hit by a physical attack move.
